short_definition: The act of pursuing a lawsuit or criminal trial; also, the party initiating a criminal suit, i.e., the state.
long_definition_html: The act of pursuing a lawsuit or criminal trial; also, the party initiating a criminal suit, i.e., the state.
long_definition_markdown: The act of pursuing a lawsuit or criminal trial; also, the party initiating a criminal suit, i.e., the state.
long_definition_text: The act of pursuing a lawsuit or criminal trial; also, the party initiating a criminal suit, i.e., the state.
